docs.abstract: An analysis of a phone belonging to Jeff Bezos found malicious code was hidden in a video sent from a WhatsApp account belonging to Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
docs.snippet: An analysis of a phone belonging to Jeff Bezos found malicious code was hidden in a video sent from a WhatsApp account belonging to Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
docs.lead_paragraph: Each week, we review the week’s news, offering analysis about the most important developments in the tech industry.

headline.main: The Week in Tech: A Tech Mogul’s Phone and the Saudi Crown Prince
headline.print_headline: The Saudi Crown Prince and the Bezos Phone

docs.abstract: Despite regulatory scrutiny and pressure from lawmakers, the industry’s wealthiest are continuing to grow at remarkable speeds for big companies.
docs.snippet: Despite regulatory scrutiny and pressure from lawmakers, the industry’s wealthiest are continuing to grow at remarkable speeds for big companies.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — When Google’s parent company, Alphabet, said on Monday that revenue at the company soared past $161 billion last year, it was a stark reminder of the widening gap between tech’s wealthiest outfits and the rest of the industry.

headline.main: The Gap Between the Haves and Have-Nots of Tech Widens
headline.print_headline: Tech Giants’ Dominance Grows, Leaving Crumbs for the Rest

byline.original: By Daisuke Wakabayashi and Matt Phillips

docs.abstract: Start by knowing what could expose you to an attack, like vacation clues, hotel Wi-Fi and inadequate verification procedures.
docs.snippet: Start by knowing what could expose you to an attack, like vacation clues, hotel Wi-Fi and inadequate verification procedures.
docs.lead_paragraph: The mobile phone belonging to Jeff Bezos, the founder and chief executive of Amazon, was allegedly hacked when he clicked a video sent through WhatsApp, essentially turning over control of his phone and all of its contents to the hackers.

headline.main: Phone Hacks Can Happen to Anyone. Here’s How to Protect Yourself.
headline.print_headline: If Bezos Can Get Hacked, You Can Too

docs.abstract: A Times investigation found widespread bullying and harassment of employees and models. The company expresses “regret.”
docs.snippet: A Times investigation found widespread bullying and harassment of employees and models. The company expresses “regret.”
docs.lead_paragraph: Victoria’s Secret defined femininity for millions of women. Its catalog and fashion shows were popular touchstones. For models, landing a spot as an “Angel” all but guaranteed international stardom.

headline.main: ‘Angels’ in Hell: The Culture of Misogyny Inside Victoria’s Secret
headline.print_headline: The ‘Angels’ at Victoria’s Secret  Suffered a Culture of Misogyny

byline.original: By Jessica Silver-Greenberg, Katherine Rosman, Sapna Maheshwari and James B. Stewart

docs.abstract: The growing uncertainty over the safety of visiting or leaving China is bedeviling companies around the world.
docs.snippet: The growing uncertainty over the safety of visiting or leaving China is bedeviling companies around the world.
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Richter had a choice: Stay or go.

headline.main: Coronavirus Thwarts Business Travelers Who ‘Need to Be in the Room’
headline.print_headline: Business Travelers Who ‘Need to Be in the Room’ Find No Way to Get There

docs.abstract: Stella Artois, Burger King and other companies have decided against showing their wares on the year’s most-watched broadcast.
docs.snippet: Stella Artois, Burger King and other companies have decided against showing their wares on the year’s most-watched broadcast.
docs.lead_paragraph: Stella Artois has big plans to promote itself during the Super Bowl.

headline.main: These Brands Said No to Running Super Bowl Commercials
headline.print_headline: These Brands Have  Better Uses for Money  Than a Super Bowl Ad

docs.abstract: Mr. Madoff, who ran the largest Ponzi scheme in history, told a court that he had less than 18 months to live.
docs.snippet: Mr. Madoff, who ran the largest Ponzi scheme in history, told a court that he had less than 18 months to live.
docs.lead_paragraph: Bernard L. Madoff, the mastermind of the largest Ponzi scheme in history, said in a court filing on Wednesday that he was dying and asked for an early release from prison.

headline.main: Bernie Madoff Says He’s Dying and Seeks Early Prison Release
headline.print_headline: Madoff Says He’s Dying and Seeks Early Release

docs.abstract: The tech giant is reportedly weighing whether to divest its third-party ad business to assuage antitrust regulators.
docs.snippet: The tech giant is reportedly weighing whether to divest its third-party ad business to assuage antitrust regulators.
docs.lead_paragraph: Topic A in New York City: a state law that eliminates broker fees for renters. Tenants are thrilled; landlords and brokers, not so much. Send us your thoughts. (Want this in your inbox each morning? Sign up here.)

headline.main: Should Google Shrink to Save Itself?

docs.abstract: The social network, which Facebook bought for $1 billion in 2012, reportedly collected $20 billion in ad revenue last year — surpassing YouTube’s ad sales.
docs.snippet: The social network, which Facebook bought for $1 billion in 2012, reportedly collected $20 billion in ad revenue last year — surpassing YouTube’s ad sales.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Trump boasted of an economic boom in his State of the Union address last night. Here’s the NYT fact check of his claims. (Want this in your inbox each morning? Sign up here.)

headline.main: Was Instagram the Steal of the Century?

docs.abstract: The president plans tariffs on metal items like nails and cables after his earlier move raised the cost of making those products in the United States.
docs.snippet: The president plans tariffs on metal items like nails and cables after his earlier move raised the cost of making those products in the United States.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump has announced plans to broaden his tariffs on foreign steel and aluminum, saying the existing tariffs had not proved as effective as he had hoped in reviving American production.

headline.main: Trump Expands Steel Tariffs, Saying They Are Short of Aim
headline.print_headline: Trump Expands Steel Tariffs, Citing Circumvention

byline.original: By Ana Swanson and Peter Eavis
